title: Hamelin A4 Exercise Book Stapled, Ruled with Margin, Header & Footer, 32 Page, Yellow, 100 Pack
features: A4 Exercise Book, Ruled with Margin, Header & Footer, 32 Page, Yellow
Yellow manila card cover to protect of your notes, staple bound
75gsm sustainably sourced, PEFC certified paper 8mm Ruled with Margin, Header & Footer
description: From the manufacturer Previous page Especially for UK Schools Classroom packs of exercise books in all sizes A4, A4+ and 9x7 inch. A4 is 210 x 297 mm, A4+ is 230x315, 9x7 is 228.6 x 17.7.8 mm 225 gsm covers Exercise books in a wide range of colours Dark blue, light blue, light green, dark green, grey, buff, orange, pink, purple, red, yellow. Quality 75 gsm paper Exercise books in a range of rulings Standard School Rulings including 8mm ruled & margin, 5mm squared and plain. Plus many more. Multiple pack sizes Exercise books in a range of page counts Standard 48 & 80 page plus various other page counts depending on size of book, 32, 40, 64 & 96.
